title: Like it

author: Tamás Körözsi
comment: Battery hog. Never dims the screen when running.

author: Brian Arpaio
comment: I'd like to see it display the time left without having to launch the app and less battery drain though

reply.author: Blukz
reply.content:
Hi Brian,

I'm working on a fix. In the meanwhile I can give you a refund. Contact me on blukzltd@gmail.com. 

Im really sorry about this 

Luka

title: Works on 360 now

reply.author: Blukz
reply.content:
Hi David, that's weard. It should be compatible with Moto 360, can you contact me on blukzltd@gmail.com and describe an issue in details ?

Thank you very much and I'm sorry you're having this trouble.

Luka
